channel.title: R on Kar Hian
channel.description: Recent content in R on Kar Hian

item.title: Toronto has shown a difference of pedestrian collision in 2011 compared to 2008
item.description: Kar Hian Ong Abstract Pedestrian is part and parcel of life in a city. In this paper, we explore the transportation data for the years 2008 and 2011 which is an observational dataset. We find that there exists some correlation between pedestrian collision and TTC stops. Our findings have implications for forecasting pedestrian collision prone areas and the factors that may cause it. Introduction With health being the talk of the world, pedestrian safety is equally important.
